https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/taSfNqBkM6fVexayWLKcqHxMg7a.jpg A story set in the 90s and in the outskirts of Rome to Ostia. A world where money, luxury cars, night clubs, cocaine and synthetic drugs are easy to run. A world in which Vittorio and Cesare, in their early twenties, act in search of their success. Don't Be Bad
